attributes.action: ACTIVELY RESPOND TO THE PEOPLES MANDATED BREXIT BY THE REFERENDUM 2016.
attributes.additional_details: ALL TRULY HONOURABLE MEMBERS, REGARDLESS OF POLITICAL AFFILIATIONS, SHOULD ENSURE THE MANDATE FROM THE PEOPLE IS ENFORCED NOW, OR THOSE WHO DO NOT BE DEEMED TREASONOUS IN THE FUTURE! - PLEASE IMPLEMENT BREXIT IMMEDIATELY!
attributes.background: Regardless of your personal opinions, the Public voted for one of two simple options! (1) REMAIN (2) LEAVE. There was no reference to any "EU deal"
